summary: This document is an email chain between FBI personnel coordinating logistics for Ghislaine Maxwell and her defense team to review evidence at the courthouse from April 13-15, 2021. It details scheduling, security protocols, and the roles of FBI agents and an AUSA.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The accused individual whose defense team is scheduled to review evidence; she will be transported by US Marshals and monitored by FBI agents during the review.

persons.name: AUSA
persons.context: The federal prosecutor who will be present all three days of the evidence review, meeting the agents and overseeing the process.

persons.name: SOS
persons.context: An FBI personnel familiar with the case who will be present all three days and is available for agents to contact.

connections.description: Prosecutor overseeing the evidence review process for the defendant Maxwell.
FBI agents are responsible for escorting and monitoring Maxwell during the evidence review, including bathroom escorts.
SOS is an FBI colleague familiar with the case, available to assist other agents during the evidence review.

events.title: Start of Maxwell evidence review
events.description: First day of a scheduled three-day evidence review for Ghislaine Maxwell and her defense team at the courthouse.

events.title: Second day of evidence review
events.description: Continuation of the evidence review process for Maxwell's case.

events.title: Third day of evidence review
events.description: Final scheduled day of the evidence review for Maxwell's defense team.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team was scheduled to review evidence from April 13-15, 2021, at a courthouse.
FBI agents were required to have a handcuff key and escort Maxwell, including to the bathroom, during the review.
An Assistant U.S. Attorney (AUSA) and an FBI agent/support (SOS) familiar with the case were present for all three days.
The evidence was transported by an evidence unit, and the review was to take place in reserved proffer rooms on the 5th floor.
The email chain shows logistical coordination between FBI personnel for security and monitoring during a critical pre-trial phase.
